message: Hello. I am Taurum. Can I help you?

replies.text: I am looking for my brother, Andor. He looks a bit like me. Have you seen him?
Are you the wife of Narael?

message: No. Sorry. I don't recall seeing anyone that looks like you.

replies.text: Are you the wife of Narael?

message: Yes! it has been so long since I have seen him. He traveled west, for business, but then he disappeared. Do you know what happened to him?

replies.text: I found him deep in an abandoned prison, Flagstone. He was trapped there by a demon, but I killed it. The sentry said he would get him out. So maybe you will see him again soon.

message: Thank you so much! There is no way I can repay you for killing a demon to save my husband!

replies.text: That's OK. I need to go, and keep looking for my brother.
No problem. Killing demons is just another day in the life of a hero.

message: I am mentioned by Buceth in Loneford, so I need to be in the game.
I am not an NPC. Just a placeholder. Valanayr temple is already mentioned (see Lodar), so needs to exist in Nor City.
I am in the Valanayr temple. See Lodar dialogue.
You have found what looks like a child's toy horse. Why is this in an old tomb?
Yikes, that smells bad! It doesn't take much imagination to know what this hole is being used for!
